text:
Great Neck Public Schools
Great Neck, New York
John L. Miller, Superintendent
AUDIO VISUAL SERVICES
Charles E. Luminati, Director
Phipps Administration Building
345 Lakeville Road
December 16, 1964
Mr. Harold Hill
Vice President
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington, D.C.
Dear Harold:
I have recently been appointed to serve as Television
Consultant and Project Director to the Great Neck Public
Schools. I am recommending to the Board that we become
an institutional member of the N.A.E.B. Could you send
the structure of dues and other information? As you
know, I have been an individual member for many years.
With best wishes for the holiday season.
Sincerely
h-i.v-iicn.Li o * iTcycjL
Project Director -
Television Coordinator
RJM:HJ
